author: felixweber
title: Eastern Town Hall Language Support
description: The Cardano Communities from East Asia need high quality information and content about Project Catalyst in their own languages
solution: The Eastern Town Hall provides "tailor made" onboarding guidance and mentorship in multiple languages, those services need to be rewarded
experience: Community Manager from Indonesia, Japan and Vietnam. Funded Proposers, Community Advisors, Proposal Mentors, Cardano Ambassadors
